             GetDocumentResponse aResponse,
             BratAnnotatorModel aBratAnnotatorModel)
        Add annotations from the CAS, which is controlled by the window size, to the brat response GetDocumentResponse
        Parameters:
        aJcas - The JCAS object containing annotations
        aResponse - A brat response containing annotations in brat protocol
        aBratAnnotatorModel - Data model for brat annotations

      • getLabelFeatureName

        String getLabelFeatureName()
        Returns:
        The feature of an UIMA annotation containing the label to be displayed in the UI.
